title: Episode #56 - Moshe Kasher & ME
description: The title of his book says it all, Kasher in the Rye: The True Tale of a White Boy from Oakland Who Became a Drug Addict, Criminal, Mental Patient, and Then Turned 16.  Comedian Moshe Kasher and I talk race, comedy, books, and hip hop.
content:encoded: The title of his book says it all, Kasher in the Rye: The True Tale of a White Boy from Oakland Who Became a Drug Addict, Criminal, Mental Patient, and Then Turned 16.  Comedian Moshe Kasher and I talk race, comedy, books, and hip hop.
